Html: CodePlex is shutting down. Please migrate this repository to GitHub. I think the first step would be to ask Codeplex to convert the Mercury repository to a Git repository. Then migration to GitHub would be simple.
Agreed. When will Irony be migrated to GitHub?

I have tried to contact the repository owner about moving to GitHub.

I have created a fork of the source there at https://github.com/Nico-VanHaaster/Irony.Net

Happy to take this further as I use this framework a fair amount.
There is already an actively maintained fork on github - https://github.com/daxnet/irony
